mainText: The South Carolina State House rally on Saturday May tenth was attended by the few and the brave. Representative Kambrell Garvin has a Town Hall on Monday, May twelth at 6 p m at Doko Manor in Blythewood. For more details, call 803, 212, 6875.

50 50 1 of South Carolina is organizing a public education rally starting at 11 Saturday May 10 at the State House. This rally coincides with the U S C graduation ceremony at the same time. Plan ahead for scarce parking! Watch the weather, too: thunderstorms are forecast with a high of 67 degrees.
